param.name: D_Calendar_Mode
param.label: Select a Mode
param.description: Controls the mode in which D Calendar appears

param.name: D_Calendar_AltLocation
param.label: Name of the alternative Div location
param.description: Enter here the name of the div in which you want D Calendar to render itself. If the div does not exist anywhere in the page, D Calendar will render itself on its default location in the module area.

param.name: D_Calendar_Style
param.label: CSS Style
param.description: The CSS style the Calendar uses.
